author: Xiaofeng He and Partha Niyogi
title: Locality Preserving Projections
window: Images Much research [5][6][7] has suggested that the human face images reside on a manifold embedded in the image space. In this subsection, we applied LPP to images of faces. The same face image dataset used in [5] is used for this experiment. Fig. 2 shows the mapping results. The images of faces are mapped into the 2-dimensional plane described by the first two coordinates of the Locality
